code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./ChatUsers.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChatUsers(_ref){let{chatroomId}=_ref;const[activeUsers,setActiveUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchActiveUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/chatrooms/".concat(chatroomId,"/users"));setActiveUsers(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching active users:',error);}};if(chatroomId){fetchActiveUsers();}},[chatroomId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chatusers-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Active Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:activeUsers.map((user,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:user},index))})]});}export default ChatUsers;
